name: Tales of Rebirth
synopsis: In this installment of ''Tales of'' series, you play the role of the 18-year old Veigue, an orphan who grew up in a village together with Claire. One day Claire is kidnapped by a group of soldiers who belong to a mysterious organization. Veigue and his friends embark on a journey to save Claire, but soon the plot evolves into a conflict between humans and Gajumas, beast-like creatures with their own culture, and Veigue and his friends must restore peace in the world.
